bibl.title: Identités ethniques et interactions culturelles dans l'Antiquité. Réflexions autour de l'ouvrage Ethnicity in Hellenistic Egypt.
bibl.note: À propos de: Koen GOUDRIAAN, Ethnical Strategies in Graeco-Roman Egypt, Ethnicity in Hellenistic Egypt = Studies in Hellenistic Civilization. III (Aarhus, 1992) pp. 74-99; - Uffe ØSTERGÅRD, What is National and Ethnic Identity?, ibidem, pp. 16-38.
